title: Picture books on video. - Volume 1 = A pet for Mrs Arbuckle
creator_credit: Video Classroom, Cathy Miller and Catharine Campbell
brief_description: The award winning, Australian Children’s stories on this video include: “A Pet for Mrs Arbuckle” by Gwenda Smyth with illustrations by Ann James and narration by Joan Bruce. “Barnaby and the Rocket” by Lydia Cowell and narration by Penne Hackforth Jones. “Whistle Up the Chimney” by Nan Hunt with illustrations by Craig Smith and narration by Pamela Lloyd.
